channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 16:39 Attention! Drone attack! Perhaps discharges of explosive items! Be in shelters!
item.description: 🟠 16:39 Attention! Drone attack! Perhaps discharges of explosive items! Be in shelters! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 16:26 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerin Old part

item.title: 🟠 13:59 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 13:59 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region.
